page.title: 05Education
page.content: Within approximatly two kilometres radius of Swanley centre are five primary schools,four infant schools and four junior schools.There is a very happy working association amongst them. There are regular meetings of head teachers,music teachers and sports teachers.Teams of footballers,netballers and rounders players have regular inter-school matches.There is an annual swimming gal ,and athletics meeting and a music festival. The theme is always co-oparation. No scores are added to find a winning school,then there are no losers. Most children transfer to either of the two comprehensive schools in the area,Swanley and Hextable. The friendly association amongst Swanley area schools is often complemented by visitors.
